titleInfo.title: LSU Architectural Drawings by Theodore Link

mods.note: Theodore C. Link designed most of the buildings for LSU when the campus was relocated in the 1920's. This group of approximately 200 drawings provide architectural, wiring, heating and plumbing specification for buildings across the campus. Many of the architectural plans provide detailed views of unique stuctural elements. The drawings are arranged in series by the names of buildings.
mods.abstract: Theodore C. Link designed most of the buildings for LSU when the campus was relocated in the 1920's. Many of the architectural plans provide detailed views of unique stuctural elements. The drawings are arranged in series by the names of buildings.
